None.Name: Disintegrating Gaze
None.Description: Disintegrates its target slowly over time. Target unit will be paralyzed during disintegration and cannot be attacked by other units. If the spell is interrupted prematurely the target will be released unharmed. May only disintegrate units.

None.Name: Pain Link
None.Description: 200% of all damage done to the unit will additionally also be distributed among all friendly units within a 20m radius.

en.Description: Disintegrating gaze: +7% disintegration speed (-0.5s per 1K life)

de.Description: Disintegrating gaze: +7% disintegration speed (-0.5s per 1K life)

ru.Description: Disintegrating gaze: +7% disintegration speed (-0.5s per 1K life)

Extra.en: Disintegrating Gaze disintegrates at a rate of 7s per 1000 lifepoints of its target at U0,  6.5s per 1000 lifepoints at U3
Extra.de: Disintegrating Gaze disintegrates at a rate of 7s per 1000 lifepoints of its target at U0,  6.5s per 1000 lifepoints at U3
Extra.ru: Disintegrating Gaze disintegrates at a rate of 7s per 1000 lifepoints of its target at U0,  6.5s per 1000 lifepoints at U3
